sorcer.core.dispatch

Class ExertDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.core.dispatch.ExertDispatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Dispatcher, Exec
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CatalogExertDispatcher, MonitoredExertDispatcher, SpaceExertDispatcher, SWIFExertDispatcher

    public abstract class ExertDispatcher
extends Object
implements Dispatcher, Exec
